description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync X462S - 46" LED-backlit Super-Slim LCD Display
The LED-backlit 46" NEC X462S offers customers a super-slim depth of 1.7" and a brighter screen than its predecessor. This industrial-strength, Full HD LCD display delivers high-quality imagery with advanced connectivity, including DisplayPort, HDMI and an Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) slot. These digital options increase flexibility for users in a variety of digital signage applications, especially video walls where up to 100 displays can be used in a 10 x 10 configuration. The optional color calibration solution enables color uniformity and fidelity across individual and multiple screens, creating a perfectly matched image in tiled digital signage environments. The X462S is ideal for hospitality, retail and government applications where minimal depth is required.
dimensions wxdxh: 105.93 cm x 4.61 cm x 61.3 cm - without stand
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), screen saver, fanless cooling system, Scheduler Function (with RTC), TileMatrix (10 x 10), Eco Mode, portrait mode, landscape mode, Open Pluggable Specification slot, Carbon Footprint Meter
